issue.title: [R] Preserve schema metadata in write_dataset()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16511](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16511). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When we moved to using ExecPlans instead of Scanner, the metadata from the input table was dropped. We preserved the R metadata but not anything else. It turned out that `sfarrow` was relying on extra metadata, and this caused reverse dependency failures in the 8.0.0 release.
